#	资源编号	策划备注	战斗名称	场景Id	对战类型	对应的台球ID
	101	花式台球匹配模式	FancyOnlineBattle	103	FancyOnlineBattle	"""1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013,1014,1015,1016"""
	102	花式台球单机模式	FancyBilliardStandaloneBattle	103	NULL	"""1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013,1014,1015,1016"""
	103	花式台球好友对战模式	FancyFriendBattle	103	FancyOnlineBattle	"""1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013,1014,1015,1016"""
	104	斯诺克台球匹配模式	SnokkerBattle	105	SnokkerBattle	"""1038,1017,1018,1019,1020,1021,1022,1023,1024,1025,1026,1027,1028,1029,1030,1031,1032,1033,1034,1035,1036,1037"""
	105	斯诺克好友对战模式	SnokkerFriendBattle	105	SnokkerBattle	"1038,1017,1018,1019,1020,1021,1022,1023,1024,1025,1026,1027,1028,1029,1030,1031,1032,1033,1034,1035,1036,1037"
